### Advance Contract Award Notice

#### Solicitation Number
01R11-25-059

#### Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to award a standing offer to a sole supplier, Southern Seed Technology Ltd., for the provision of Winter Nursery Services specializing in pure seed production in New Zealand.

#### Requirement

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires a supplier to provide Winter Nursery Services for the selection of crops (flax, barley, peas, wheat, and oats) in New Zealand. The supplier will be responsible for planting, managing, and harvesting experimental lines to specified quantities and purity standards for individual AAFC plant breeding programs.

#### Service Description

The services include:

* Planting of experimental lines to specified quantities and purity standards
* Management and harvesting of experimental lines
* Phytosanitary inspection and certification of seed for export to Canada
* Packaging and shipping of pure seed to a designated shipping agent in Christchurch, New Zealand

#### Justification for Sole Supplier

Southern Seed Technology Ltd. is the only supplier in New Zealand that specializes in pure seed production. They are certified by the New Zealand government to import, store, treat, and plant seed under quarantine and produce pedigree seeds following Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry (MAF) standards.

#### Tender Closing Date and Time

July 12, 2024, 2:00 pm CST.

#### Statements of Capability

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described herein may submit a statement of capabilities by email to the contract specialist on or before the closing date. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

#### Estimated Contract Value

$1,500,000 CAD

#### Contract Period

August 1, 2024, to July 31, 2027

#### Contact Information

For any questions concerning this requirement, please contact:

Contracting Specialist, Western Service Centre
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
